item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Roku Logo Roku, Inc. is an American publicly traded company based in San Jose, California. Roku manufactures a variety of digital media players that allow customers to access Internet streamed video or audio services through televisions. Roku has an advertising business and also licenses its hardware and software to other companies. Source
You can download the Roku logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Roku
item.description: Roku, Inc. is an American publicly traded company based in San Jose, California. Roku manufactures a variety of digital media players that allow customers to access Internet streamed video or audio services through televisions. Roku has an advertising business and also licenses its hardware and software to other companies. Source
